alert.note: Alert for Graham; Greenlee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 1:36AM MST until September 13 at 2:15AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Graham County in southeastern Arizona... Central Greenlee County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 215 AM MST. * At 135 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Morenci, or 8 miles southwest of Clifton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. Winds of 55 mph have been measured in the Safford area. SOURCE...Radar and observation indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clifton, Morenci, Safford Regional Airport, York, Three Way and Guthrie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
